# Conjuration Foil (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Bard Spells|Bard 4]], [[3rd Level Magus Spells|Magus 3]], [[4th Level Medium Spells|Medium 4]], [[4th Level Occultist Spells|Occultist 4]], [[4th Level Psychic Spells|Psychic 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Spiritualist Spells|Spiritualist 4]], [[3rd Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 3]], [[4th Level Witch Spells|Witch 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** 20-foot radius spread

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** Will partial (see text)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (object)

**Source:** Ultimate Intrigue, pg. 207

All creatures in the area gain a +4 bonus on saving throws against teleportation effects. If any creature would enter or depart the area via a summoning or teleportation effect, that creature takes 1d6 points of damage per spell level of the triggering effect (or half the HD of the originating creature if the effect has no spell level) and arrives in a random similar location within the triggering effectâ€™s range, rather than the intended destination. A successful Will save halves the damage and negates the altered destination
